longBusinessSummary: Apollo Strategic Growth Capital II does not have significant operations. It intends to effect a merger, share exchange, asset acquisition, share purchase, recapitalization, reorganization, or other similar business combination with one or more businesses or entities. The company was formerly known as APH I (Sub I), Ltd. and changed its name to Apollo Strategic Growth Capital II in December 2020. Apollo Strategic Growth Capital II was incorporated in 2008 and is based in New York, New York.

companyOfficers.name: Mr. Scott M. Kleinman
companyOfficers.title: Exec. Chairman of Board of Directors
